Translations.Text: Tba-china-mima
E'ibora suspasta kitabara ayata
Sihamte mumina horaa na'i buli hayato tumi atmaghati hai paraiba
Ami iccha karaile akasara paraa sihamtara oparata enekuraa nidarsana aratirna karailohemtena, yara phalata se'itora prati sihamtara ghara aranata hai parailehemtena
Arau yetiya'i sihamtara ocarata rahamanara taraphara paraa kono natuna upadesa ahe, tetiya'i sihamte tara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya
Eteke sihamte arasye asbikara karaiche. Seye sihamte yito lai thatta-bidraupa karaichila tara prakrta barta sihamtara ocarata ati sighrae ahi paraiba
Sihamte prthiraira phale laksya nakarae neki? Ami tata pratyeka prakarara bahuto utkrsta udbhida utpanna karaicho
niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau niscaya tomara raba, teraemi maha paraakramasali, parama dayalu
Arau smarana karaa, yetiya tomara pratipalake muchaka mati ka’le, ‘tumi yalima sampradayara ocaralai yoraa
phira'a'unara sampradayara ocarata; sihamte takbaraa aralambana nakaraiba ne’
mucha'i ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora asanka haiche ye, sihamte moka asbikara karaiba
‘Arau mora buku sankucita hai paraiche, lagate mora jibha'o sbabharaika nahaya. Eteke tumi haraunara prati'o ahi praerana karaa
‘Arau mora biraud'dhe sihamtara ocarata eta abhiyogo ache, seye mora asanka haiche ye, sihamte moka hatya karaiba’
Allahe ka’le, ‘nahaya, ketiya'o nahaya, tomaloka duyo mora nidarsana lai yoraa, niscaya ami tomalokara lagata acho sraranakarai hicape
‘Eteke tomaloka duyo phira'a'unara ocarata gai koraa, ‘niscaya ami bisbajagatara pratipalakara (taraphara paraa praeraita) raachula
‘yate tumi bani icharaa'ilaka amara lagata patha'i diya’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘ami tomaka saisara kalata amara majate lalana-palana karaa nachilo ne? Arau arasye tumi tomara jiranara bahu bachara amara majate atibahita karaicha
‘arau tumi tomara karma yito karaibalagiya se'ito karaichaye arau tumi akrtajnasakalara antarbhukta’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘se'ito ma'i karaichilo tetiya, yetiya ma'i bibhraanta achilo’

‘Eteke yetiya ma'i tomalokaka bhaya karaichilo, tetiya ma'i tomalokara paraa palayana karaichilo. Iyara pichata mora pratipalake moka prajna (nabu'orata) dana karaiche arau moka raachulasakalara antarbhukta karaiche
‘Arau mora prati tomara yi anugrahara katha ullekha karai tumi daya dekhuraa'i acha, tara prakrta satya e'ito ye, tumi bani icharaa'ilaka dasata parainata karaicha’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘srstijagatara raba akau ki’
mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastura raba, yadi tomaloke niscita bisbasi horaa’
Phira'a'une tara ocarae pajarae thaka lokasakalaka laksya karai ka’le, ‘tomaloke manoyoga sahakarae sunichane’
mucha'i ka’le, ‘teraemi tomalokara raba arau tomalokara purbapurausasakalorao raba’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘tomalokara prati praeraita tomalokara e'i raachulajana niscaya ejana baliya’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘te'om pura arau pascimara lagate e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalo bastura raba; yadi tomaloke buji poraa’
Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘yadi tumi mora paraibarte anaka ilaharaupe grahana karaa tente ma'i tomaka arasye karaaraud'dha karaima’
Mucha'i ka’le, ‘yadi ma'i tomara ocarata spasta kono bisaya lai ahom, tathapi'o’
phira'a'une ka’le, ‘yadi tumi satyabadi horaa tente seya lai aha’
Tara pichata mucha'i te'omra lakhutidala niksepa karaile tatksanata seya edala spasta ajagara sapata parainata ha’la
Arau mucha'i te'omra hata (kasalatira paraa) ola'i anara phalata tatksanata seya darsakara drstita subhra ujjbala pratibhata ha’la
Phira'a'une tara ocarae pajarae thaka paraisadabargaka uddesya karai ka’le, ‘niscaya e'om ejana sudaksa yadukara’
‘E'om nijara yadu saktirae tomalokaka tomalokara desara paraa'i bahiskrta karaiba bicarae. Eteke tomaloke moka ki paraamarsa diya’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘te'omka arau te'omra bhatrka kichu samaya arakasa diyaka arau nagarae nagarae sangraahakasakalaka patha'i diyaka
‘yate sihamte aponara ocarata pratyeka abhijna yadukaraka lai upasthita haya’
Tara pichata eta nirdharaita dinara nirdista samayata yadukarasakalaka ekatraita karaa ha’la
arau manuhaka koraa ha’la, ‘tomaloke'o samabeta ha’bane’
‘yate ami yadukarasakalaka anusarana karaiba parao, yadi sihamte bijayi haya’
Eteke yetiya yadukarabilake ahi phira'a'unaka ka’le, ‘yadi ami bijayi ha'om tente amara babe puraskara thakiba ne’
phira'a'une ka’le, ‘haya, arau niscaya tomaloka tetiya mora ghanistasakalara antarbhukta ha’ba’
Mucha'i sihamtaka ka’le, ‘tomalokara yi niksepa karaibalagiya ache seya niksepa karaa’
Tara pichata sihamte sihamtara rachi arau lakhutibora niksepa karaile arau sihamte ka’le, ‘phira'a'unara maryadara sapata! Niscaya amiye'i bijayi hama’
Tara pichata mucha'i te'omra lakhutidala niksepa karaile, phalata tatksanata i sihamtara micha kirtisamuha graasa karaibalai dharaile
Tetiya yadukarasakala chajadaranata hai paraila
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘ami imana anilo srstijagatara pratipalakara prati
‘yijana mucha arau haraunara raba’

Phira'a'une ka’le, ‘ma'i tomalokaka anumati diyara agate'i tomaloke tara prati bisbasa karaila? Niscaya siye tomalokara pradhana arau siye tomalokaka yadu siksa diche. Eteke atisighrae tomaloke iyara parainama paba. Niscaya ami tomalokara hata arau bharai biparaita disara paraa kati dima arau tomaloka sakaloke sulabid'dha karaima’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘kono asubidha na'i, niscaya ami amara pratipalakara phale'i ubhati yama
Niscaya ami asa posana karao ye, amara pratipalake amara aparaadhasamuha ksama karai diba, karana amiye muminasakalara majata prathama
